verses.verse: He cried<WH7121> also in mine ears<WH241> with a loud<WH1419> voice,<WH6963> saying,<WH559> Cause them that have charge<WH6486> over the city<WH5892> to draw near,<WH7126> even every man<WH376> with his destroying<WH4892> weapon<WH3627> in his hand.<WH3027>

And, behold,<WH2009> six<WH8337> men<WH376> came<WH935> from the way<WH4480> <WH1870> of the higher<WH5945> gate,<WH8179> which<WH834> lieth<WH6437> toward the north,<WH6828> and every man<WH376> a slaughter<WH4660> weapon<WH3627> in his hand;<WH3027> and one<WH259> man<WH376> among<WH8432> them was clothed<WH3847> with linen,<WH906> with a writer's<WH5608> inkhorn<WH7083> by his side:<WH4975> and they went in,<WH935> and stood<WH5975> beside<WH681> the brazen<WH5178> altar.<WH4196>

And the glory<WH3519> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> was gone up<WH5927> from<WH4480> <WH5921> the cherub,<WH3742> whereupon<WH834> <WH5921> he was,<WH1961> to<WH413> the threshold<WH4670> of the house.<WH1004> And he called<WH7121> to<WH413> the man<WH376> clothed<WH3847> with linen,<WH906> which<WH834> had the writer's<WH5608> inkhorn<WH7083> by his side;<WH4975>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Go through<WH5674> the midst<WH8432> of the city,<WH5892> through the midst<WH8432> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> and set<WH8427> a mark<WH8420> upon<WH5921> the foreheads<WH4696> of the men<WH376> that sigh<WH584> and that cry<WH602> for<WH5921> all<WH3605> the abominations<WH8441> that be done<WH6213> in the midst<WH8432> thereof.

And to the others<WH428> he said<WH559> in mine hearing,<WH241> Go<WH5674> ye after<WH310> him through the city,<WH5892> and smite:<WH5221> let not<WH408> your eye<WH5869> spare,<WH2347> neither<WH408> have ye pity: <WH2550>

Slay <WH2026> utterly<WH4889> old<WH2205> and young,<WH970> both maids,<WH1330> and little children,<WH2945> and women:<WH802> but come not near<WH5066> <WH408> <WH5921> any<WH3605> man<WH376> upon<WH5921> whom<WH834> is the mark;<WH8420> and begin<WH2490> at my sanctuary.<WH4480> <WH4720> Then they began<WH2490> at the ancient<WH2205> men<WH376> which<WH834> were before<WH6440> the house.<WH1004>

And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Defile<WH2930> <WH853> the house,<WH1004> and fill<WH4390> <WH853> the courts<WH2691> with the slain:<WH2491> go ye forth.<WH3318> And they went forth,<WH3318> and slew<WH5221> in the city.<WH5892>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> while they were slaying<WH5221> them, and I<WH589> was left,<WH7604> that I fell<WH5307> upon<WH5921> my face,<WH6440> and cried,<WH2199> and said,<WH559> Ah<WH162> Lord<WH136> GOD!<WH3069> wilt thou<WH859> destroy<WH7843> <WH853> all<WH3605> the residue<WH7611> of Israel<WH3478> in thy pouring out<WH8210> <WH853> of thy fury<WH2534> upon<WH5921> Jerusalem?<WH3389>

Then said<WH559> he unto<WH413> me, The iniquity<WH5771> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> and Judah<WH3063> is exceeding<WH3966> <WH3966> great,<WH1419> and the land<WH776> is full<WH4390> of blood,<WH1818> and the city<WH5892> full<WH4390> of perverseness:<WH4297> for<WH3588> they say,<WH559> The LORD<WH3068> hath forsaken<WH5800> <WH853> the earth,<WH776> and the LORD<WH3068> seeth<WH7200> not.<WH369>
And as for me<WH589> also,<WH1571> mine eye<WH5869> shall not<WH3808> spare,<WH2347> neither<WH3808> will I have pity,<WH2550> but I will recompense<WH5414> their way<WH1870> upon their head.<WH7218>

And, behold,<WH2009> the man<WH376> clothed<WH3847> with linen,<WH906> which<WH834> had the inkhorn<WH7083> by his side,<WH4975> reported<WH7725> the matter,<WH1697> saying,<WH559> I have done<WH6213> as<WH3605> <WH834> thou hast commanded<WH6680> me.
